title: AWS re:Invent 2026
description: Amazon Web Services' premier global cloud computing conference bringing together developers, IT professionals, and business leaders to explore the latest innovations in cloud technology, AI, and machine learning.
overview: AWS re:Invent 2026 returns to Las Vegas with a strong focus on agentic AI, generative AI tooling, and production-ready machine learning. With over 1,000 technical sessions, hands-on labs, and keynotes from AWS leadership including CEO Matt Garman, attendees will discover major updates to Amazon Bedrock, new autonomous agent frameworks, and clearer paths for deploying and scaling AI in enterprise environments. The conference features next-gen compute innovations, AI accelerators, and deep dives into security, governance, and cost control.
venue: Multiple venues: Caesars Forum, The Venetian, MGM Grand, Mandalay Bay, and Wynn
audience: Developers, Cloud Architects, IT Professionals, Business Decision Makers, Technical Project Managers
agenda: Monday keynote from AWS CEO Matt Garman unveiling latest cloud innovations
1,000+ technical sessions covering AWS core services to emerging AI technologies
Hands-on labs and workshops with AWS experts and engineers
Innovation Talks showcasing customer success stories and use cases
AWS Expo with partner solutions and product demonstrations
Builders' sessions, chalk talks, and AWS Certification preparation
Thursday evening Bash with live music and networking
re:Play closing party celebration

title: Microsoft Ignite 2026
description: Microsoft's flagship technical conference for IT professionals, developers, and business leaders featuring cutting-edge innovations in AI, cloud computing, security, and enterprise technology.
overview: Microsoft Ignite 2026 returns to San Francisco's Moscone Center, drawing 20,000 attendees for four days of innovation and learning. With a multiyear commitment to the city, the conference focuses on AI & Copilot innovation, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise security. Explore Microsoft 365 Copilot, Agent Factory, Azure advancements, and hybrid cloud strategies through in-depth technical sessions, product announcements, and hands-on training. Attendees gain direct access to Microsoft engineers, participate in expert-led workshops, and network with technology leaders driving digital transformation.
audience: IT Professionals, Developers, Business Leaders, Cloud Architects, Technology Partners, CIOs
agenda: Opening keynotes revealing major AI and cloud announcements
AI & Copilot Innovation sessions: Microsoft 365 Copilot, Agent Factory, Agent 365
Cloud & Infrastructure deep dives on Azure, hybrid cloud, and scalable architectures
Security & Compliance tracks covering Zero Trust and enterprise protection
Microsoft Hub with partner solutions and interactive demonstrations
Technical workshops and hands-on training labs
Partner-specific programming and networking events

title: Apple WWDC 2026
description: Apple's premier developer conference unveiling the next generation of iOS, macOS, watchOS, and other Apple platforms, featuring keynotes, technical sessions, and hands-on labs with Apple engineers.
overview: The Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2026 takes place at Apple Park in Cupertino, California from June 8-12. This flagship event showcases major software updates including iOS 27, macOS 27, watchOS 27, tvOS 27, and visionOS 27, with enhanced Apple Intelligence features and platform unification. Developers gain exclusive access to Apple engineers through one-on-one lab consultations, attend in-depth technical sessions covering new APIs and frameworks, and participate in the Swift Student Challenge. The conference includes the iconic Monday keynote from Tim Cook, Innovation Talks, the Thursday Bash celebration, and the prestigious Apple Design Awards.
audience: Developers, Software Engineers, App Designers, Students, STEM Members, Technology Innovators
agenda: Monday 10:00 AM PT: Keynote address unveiling iOS 27, macOS 27, and all platform updates
Platforms State of the Union technical dive covering APIs and new frameworks
200+ technical sessions across all Apple platforms and technologies
Hands-on labs with one-on-one consultations with Apple engineers
Design sessions focusing on user interface and user experience best practices
Swift Student Challenge winner presentations and recognition
Thursday evening Bash with live music and developer networking
Apple Design Awards ceremony celebrating outstanding apps and games
